00003 ns::import('hygia.libs.validator.Validator');
00004 ns::import('hygia.libs.io.Response');
00005 ns::import('hygia.libs.exception.ValidatorException');
00006 
00013 class ValidatorTime extends Validator implements IValidator {
00014 
00015     private $sValidator;
00016     private $aValidationErrors;
00017 
00018     public function __construct($sValidator) {
00019         $this->sValidator = $sValidator;
00020         $this->aValidationErrors = array();
00021     }
00022 
00030     public function run(Response $oResponse) {
00031 
00032         if (!$oResponse instanceof Response) {
00033             throw new ValidaotrException('Response is not of type Response');
00034         }
00035 
00036         // gets the transfer time and compare with given value - valid if given
00037         // value is smaller (shorter) 
00038         $bValid = (int) $this->sValidator < $oResponse->getTransferTime();
00039         if (!$bValid) {
00040             $this->aValidationErrors[] = 'Time validator failed. Expected transfer time below: ' . $this->sValidator . '. Got: ' . $oResponse->getTransferTime();
00041         }
00042         return $bValid;
00043     }
00044 
00050     public function getValidationErrors() {
00051         return $this->aValidationErrors;
00052     }
00053 
00054 }
